title: 2 game promotions series????
body: Hi, i was in my promotion series to silver 1 and i had won one game. Next game was very close but we ultimately lost. gg. The thing is, upon entering the score screen i got a popup saying i lost my promos!! i am 100% positive i DID NOT dodge queue. can someone look into this please??

replies.body: im going to stress the fact that its IMPOSSIBLE i queue dodged. i did not queue up AT ALL after playing the first game right up until i queued for the second game a few hours later. there was one dodge when i queued up for the second time BUT i had no dodge timer and i went straight into the game. rito pls.

I've got your League ranked history pulled up, and you're right about not having dodged any games after playing the first one. I did see a queue dodge just before you played that first game, which will be counted as a loss since the queue was left.
